entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning and ending near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
